title: Mystery of the Haunted Hut
description: "It's blood! Blood on the snow!" And right outside the shack that's supposed to be deserted.Rusty and her brothers have come to Deep Hollow for their winter vacation. They have fun sledding, skating and ice boating. But they soon discover that something very mysterious is going on. First there are puzzling lights, then those shivery words about blood. Then too, how could the ice boat disappear so suddenly?It's cold at Deep Hollow, and there are plenty of chills in this story too!
author: Mary Graham Bonner
